text: For a Few Dollars More (1965) is a Spaghetti Western movie directed by Sergio Leone and starring Clint Eastwood. It is the second movie in the Dollars trilogy and was released in the United States in 1967. The first movie in the trilogy is A Fistful of Dollars; the third is The Good, the Bad and the Ugly. == Other websites == * *The Spaghetti Western Database Category:1965 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:Italian-language movies Category:Italian Western (genre) movies Category:Spanish Western (genre) movies Category:German Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Sergio Leone Category:Movies composed by Ennio Morricone
title: For a Few Dollars More
